item.title: Report X-2024072186
item.description:
Report X-2024072186

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-05T15:15:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-24
  • City: MAGNA
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package is in good condition. There is no OP-900 on the package and there is no Hazmat Certification paperwork for it. The recipient or shipper has either refused or failed to provide the OP-900 and the Hazmat certification in order send this this hazmat on to the recipient or the shipper. So this needs to be disposed up since the we can not return it to the shipper since we are not the origin station.
